oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John H. Adams corresondence with Stuart Wilder, 1937 May 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Adams, John H.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from John H. Adams to Stuart Wilder recounting his service under John T. Wilder in the Roan Iron Works company John Wilder founded in Tennessee during Reconstruction. The correspondence includes an enclosed copy of an original letter composed in 1871 with a poem entitled "Gen John T. Wilder of the Lightining Brigade" which reflects on Wilder's Brigade as well as the post-war life of General Wilder.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Reconstruction (U.S. history, 1865-1877); United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Veterans
Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
Roane Iron Company; United States. Army. Wilder's Brigade
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence and papers, 1865-1937
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
